attributes.action: allow the public identification of all paedophiles upon conviction.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To allow the public identification of all paedophiles upon conviction.  Accepting that for lawful safety reasons, their addresses or home towns may not be "advertised", but at least their image and name be in the public arena to give parents an advantage in the protection of their children.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
